2 Section 7 of the Bank of Ceylon Ordinance (herein- Replacement after referred to 5 the “principal enactment”), as amended of Section T by Law No, 10 of 1974, is hereby repealed and the following Chapter 207. new section substituted therefor :—
“Capital. ‘7. () The authorized capital of the bank shall be one thousand million rupees divided into one million shares of one thousand rupees each.
(2) ‘The paid-up capital of the bank shall
. be such amount as may he determined from time to time by the Minister by Order published in the Gazette.
